description: After using PostgreSQL you realize there are a few things missing that would make using it in large, production environments easier: automated partitioning, autonomous functions, logical replication and better dump filtering. This video will discuss several projects that show how easy it is to make add-ons to allow some of these features.
short_description: After using PostgreSQL you realize there are a few things missing that would make using it in large, production environments eas
title: Keith Fiske: When Postgres Can't, You Can!
